title: Goldie Hawn
summary: Goldie Jeanne Hawn (born November 21, 1945) is an American actress, producer, and singer.[1] She rose to fame on the NBC sketch comedy program Rowan & Martin's Laugh-In (1968â€“1970), before going on to receive the Academy Award and Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress for her performance in Cactus Flower (1969).
